name: L4UR4
description:
Our submission to Mech Jam 3!

You play as L4UR4 and Max, on a mission to liberate the city and track a dangerous individual. But not everyone is on the same page, and things may take a drastic turn. 

  • MOVE: [A]  [D]
  • FLY: [SPACE]
  • LIGHT ATTACK:  [J]
  • HEAVY ATTACK: [K]
  • CHARGE: [L]
  • BLOCK: [C]
  • ADVANCE CONVERSATION: [E]

THE TEAM:

  • K.C.Dignan - Story, Gameplay, Music, Programming, SFX, Voice Direction. 
  • Liam Swift - Gameplay, AI, Systems Programming, Music
  • Neryko - Art, Animation, VFX.

Original Soundtrack:  'ウォー・クライム'

  • K.C.Dignan - Music and Lyrics
  • Adhiewn - Vocals and Japanese Translation

CAST:

  • Voice of L4UR4 - Grace Winpenny
  • Voice of Max - Luna Freyava
